patthana2.8:104.1: Nonīvaraṇo dhammo nīvaraṇassa ca nonīvaraṇassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.8:104.16: vatthuṃ nonīvaraṇe khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā nīvaraṇā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.8:104.18: nonīvaraṇādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ nīvaraṇānañca cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3

patthana2.8:109.5: nīvaraṇā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.8:115.3: saddhaṃ upanissāya mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti;
patthana2.8:116.1: Nonīvaraṇo dhammo nīvaraṇassa ca nonīvaraṇassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—

patthana2.8:117.5: nīvaraṇā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā nīvaraṇānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana2.8:335.1: Nīvaraṇañceva nīvaraṇasampayuttañca nīvaraṇasampayuttañceva no ca nīvaraṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇasampayutto ceva no ca nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—

patthana2.8:336.1: Nīvaraṇañceva nīvaraṇasampayuttañca nīvaraṇasampayuttañceva no ca nīvaraṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo ceva nīvaraṇasampayutto ca nīvaraṇasampayutto ceva no ca nīvaraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—

patthana2.8:339.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (sabbattha nava), kamme nava, āhāre nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.8:343.1: Nīvaraṇañceva nīvaraṇasampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo ceva nīvaraṇasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.8:343.2: vicikicchānīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca avijjānīvaraṇaṃ, uddhaccanīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca avijjānīvaraṇaṃ. #1
patthana2.8:344.1: Nīvaraṇasampayuttañceva no ca nīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo ceva nīvaraṇasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.8:345.1: Nīvaraṇañceva nīvaraṇasampayuttañca nīvaraṇasampayuttañceva no ca nīvaraṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo ceva nīvaraṇasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana2.8:345.2: vicikicchānīvaraṇañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca avijjānīvaraṇaṃ, uddhaccanīvaraṇañca sampayuttake ca khandhe paṭicca avijjānīvaraṇaṃ.
patthana2.8:348.1: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava.
patthana2.8:350.1: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā nava … pe … navippayutte nava.
patthana2.8:352.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi (sabbattha tīṇi), magge tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana2.8:354.1: (Evaṃ sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā ninnānākaraṇā.)
patthana2.8:359.1: Nīvaraṇo ceva nīvaraṇasampayutto ca dhammo nīvaraṇassa ceva nīvaraṇasampayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.8:359.2: nīvaraṇā ceva nīvaraṇasampayuttā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1

patthana2.8:360.2: nīvaraṇā ceva nīvaraṇasampayuttā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana2.8:361.1: Nīvaraṇo ceva nīvaraṇasampayutto ca dhammo nīvaraṇassa ceva nīvaraṇasampayuttassa ca nīvaraṇasampayuttassa ceva no ca nīvaraṇassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.8:361.2: nīvaraṇā ceva nīvaraṇasampayuttā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ nīvaraṇānañca hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.8:363.1: Nīvaraṇo ceva nīvaraṇasampayutto ca dhammo nīvaraṇassa ceva nīvaraṇasampayuttassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.8:363.4: Nīvaraṇe ārabbha nīvaraṇasampayuttā ceva no ca nīvaraṇā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.8:363.6: Nīvaraṇe ārabbha nīvaraṇā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.8:364.1: Nīvaraṇasampayutto ceva no ca nīvaraṇo dhammo nīvaraṇasampayuttassa ceva no ca nīvaraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.8:364.2: nīvaraṇasampayutte ceva no ca nīvaraṇe khandhe ārabbha nīvaraṇasampayuttā ceva no ca nīvaraṇā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.8:364.4: Nīvaraṇasampayutte ceva no ca nīvaraṇe khandhe ārabbha nīvaraṇā uppajjanti.
patthana2.8:364.6: Nīvaraṇasampayutte ceva no ca nīvaraṇe khandhe ārabbha nīvaraṇā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. #3
patthana2.8:365.1: Nīvaraṇo ceva nīvaraṇasampayutto ca nīvaraṇasampayutto ceva no ca nīvaraṇo ca dhammā nīvaraṇassa ceva nīvaraṇasampayuttassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. #3
patthana2.8:367.1: Nīvaraṇo ceva nīvaraṇasampayutto ca dhammo nīvaraṇassa ceva nīvaraṇasampayuttassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.8:368.1: Nīvaraṇasampayutto ceva no ca nīvaraṇo dhammo nīvaraṇasampayuttassa ceva no ca nīvaraṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.8:368.4: nīvaraṇasampayutte ceva no ca nīvaraṇe khandhe garuṃ katvā nīvaraṇasampayuttā ceva no ca nīvaraṇā khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.8:368.6: nīvaraṇasampayuttā ceva no ca nīvaraṇādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.8:368.9: nīvaraṇasampayutte ceva no ca nīvaraṇe khandhe garuṃ katvā nīvaraṇā uppajjanti.
patthana2.8:368.11: nīvaraṇasampayuttā ceva no ca nīvaraṇādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.8:368.14: nīvaraṇasampayutte ceva no ca nīvaraṇe khandhe garuṃ katvā nīvaraṇā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti.
patthana2.8:368.16: nīvaraṇasampayuttā ceva no ca nīvaraṇādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ nīvaraṇānañca adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.8:369.1: Nīvaraṇo ceva nīvaraṇasampayutto ca nīvaraṇasampayutto ceva no ca nīvaraṇo ca dhammā nīvaraṇassa ceva nīvaraṇasampayuttassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.8:370.1: Anantarapaccayena paccayo (āvajjanāpi vuṭṭhānampi natthi, sabbattha purimā purimā kātabbā) … samanantarapaccayena paccayo … nava … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … nava … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nava … nissayapaccayena paccayo … nava … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … nava (ārammaṇasadisaṃ, vipāko natthi) … āsevanapaccayena paccayo … pañca.
patthana2.8:372.1: Nīvaraṇasampayutto ceva no ca nīvaraṇo dhammo nīvaraṇasampayuttassa ceva no ca nīvaraṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana2.8:372.2: nīvaraṇasampayuttā ceva no ca nīvaraṇā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.8:372.4: Nīvaraṇasampayuttā ceva no ca nīvaraṇā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.8:372.6: Nīvaraṇasampayuttā ceva no ca nīvaraṇā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ nīvaraṇānañca kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana2.8:374.1: Nīvaraṇasampayutto ceva no ca nīvaraṇo dhammo nīvaraṇasampayuttassa ceva no ca nīvaraṇassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … indriyapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … jhānapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … maggapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … nava … atthipaccayena paccayo … nava … natthipaccayena paccayo … nava … vigatapaccayena paccayo … nava … avigatapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.8:377.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
patthana2.8:379.1: Nīvaraṇo ceva nīvaraṇasampayutto ca dhammo nīvaraṇassa ceva nīvaraṇasampayuttassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.8:383.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava … pe … noavigate nava.
patthana2.8:385.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi … pe … namagge tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.8:387.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (anulomamātikā) … pe … avigate nava.
patthana2.8:392.1: Nīvaraṇavippayuttaṃ nīvaraṇiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇavippayutto nīvaraṇiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana2.8:392.2: nīvaraṇavippayuttaṃ nīvaraṇiyaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
